title: Damon Hill to share his incredible story in 'Evening with...' tour
summary: Damon Hill will share stories from the agony and ecstasy of incredible racing career in a new show

qa_pairs.question: Which team did Damon Hill race for when he won his Formula 1 World Championship?
What is the term used to describe the emotional highs and lows experienced by drivers during a racing career?
In which year did Damon Hill win his first and only World Championship title?
